messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Space Station 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Security Checkpoint.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to [REDACTED], not more than 15 energy draining parasites have swarmed into the maintenance tunnels.
